project.description: Volatility - Step 6 - Dump Suspicious Processes and Drivers

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MEMORY_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the raw memory image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the location of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_PROFILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the profile of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build output paths.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the evidence processing output.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VOLATILITY_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify extra arguments to pass to volatility

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [[ ! -d $OUTPUT_LOCATION ]]; then mkdir $OUTPUT_LOCATION || true; fi if [[ ! -d $VOLATILITY_OUTPUT_LOCATION ]] ; then mkdir $VOLATILITY_OUTPUT_LOCATION fi vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} dlldump --dump-dir ${VOLATILITY_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/dlldump_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} moddump --dump-dir ${VOLATILITY_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/moddump_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} procdump --dump-dir ${VOLATILITY_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/procdump_output vol.py ${VOLATILITY_ARGS} memdump --dump-dir ${VOLATILITY_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/memdump_output
